select a.*,b.name as work_name,d.customer_ids,d.contacts_ids,d.business_ids,d.contract_ids, (select count(*) from wk_work_task_comment where type_id = a.task_id and type = 1) as commentCount, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id and status = 5) as childWCCount, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id) as childAllCount from wk_work_task a left join wk_work b on a.work_id = b.work_id left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where a.ishidden = 0 and a.is_top = #{isTop} and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2 or a.status = 5) and a.is_archive = 0 and (a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{userId}) and a.pid = 0
and
a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{userId}
and
a.label_id like concat('%,',#{labelId},',%')
and date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
and YEARWEEK(date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
and date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
and a.stop_time is null
and a.stop_time < now()
and date_format(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and (a.name like concat('%',#{data.name},'%') or a.description like concat('%',#{data.name},'%'))
order by a.create_time desc
order by a.stop_time desc
order by a.update_time desc
order by a.priority desc
select a.*,b.name as workName from wk_work_task a left join `wk_work` b on a.work_id = b.work_id where task_id = #{taskId}

select label_id,name as label_name,color from wk_work_task_label where label_id in
#{labelId}

select a.task_id,a.name,a.stop_time,a.priority,a.status,d.customer_ids,d.contacts_ids,d.business_ids,d.contract_ids, (select count(*) from wk_work_task_comment where type_id = a.task_id and type = 1) as comment_count, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id) as child_all_count, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id and status = 5) as child_WC_count from wk_work_task as a left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where pid = 0 and ishidden = 1
and (a.main_user_id = #{userId} or a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%'))
order by a.hidden_time desc

select a.task_id,a.name,a.description,a.start_time,a.stop_time,a.create_time, a.create_user_id,a.main_user_id,a.owner_user_id, (CASE WHEN a.priority = 0 THEN '无' WHEN a.priority = 1 THEN '低' WHEN a.priority = 2 THEN '中' WHEN a.priority = 3 THEN '高' END ) as priority, (CASE WHEN a.is_top = 0 THEN '收件箱' WHEN a.is_top = 1 THEN '今天要做' WHEN a.is_top = 2 THEN '下一步要做' WHEN a.is_top = 3 THEN '以后要做' END ) as is_top, (select GROUP_CONCAT(name) from wk_work_task_label where find_in_set(label_id,a.label_id)) as label_name, d.customer_ids, d.contacts_ids, d.business_ids, d.contract_ids, if(d.customer_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(customer_name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_customer where find_in_set(customer_id,d.customer_ids))) as customer_name, if(d.contacts_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_contacts where find_in_set(contacts_id,d.contacts_ids))) as contacts_name, if(d.business_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(business_name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_business where find_in_set(business_id,d.business_ids))) as business_name, if(d.contract_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_contract where find_in_set(contract_id,d.contract_ids))) as contract_name from wk_work_task as a left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where (a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{data.userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{data.userId}) and a.pid = 0 and a.ishidden = 0 and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2) and a.is_archive = 0 order by a.is_top
